1.12.2.1.3.0:
Revamped the advancement system.
Updated UI.
Updated some recipes.
Dependence with the Thermal Foundation is no longer required.
1.12.2.1.2.3:
Update recipe for solar core advanced.
Fixed a lot of bugs.
1.12.2.1.2.2: Fixed a lot of small bugs.
1.12.2.1.2.1:
Now you can obtain the solar panel from solar helmet.
Fixed bugs in the mod.
1.12.2.1.2.0:
Fixed a serious bug in the solar helmet.
Now you can get back the lapis lazuli from the lapis shards.
Updated the minimum version of forge.
1.12.2.1.1.2: Fixed a bug that causes crashes on server side when user place a solar panel in the world. Thanks to Doedelsander for reporting it.
1.12.2.1.1.1: Fixed a bug that causes crashes on server side. Thanks to Doedelsander for reporting it.
1.12.2.1.1.0:
Added Signalum Solar Panel.
Some crafting has changed, check the JEI.
Added translations for other languages.
1.12.2.1.0.1:
Added support for oreDict in the recipes.
Fixed rendering of solar panels.

1.13.2.1.1.1: Fix a bug in the recipes.
1.13.2.1.1.0:
Add a wrench to dismount easily solar panels.
Fixed minor bugs.
1.13.2.1.0.0: First beta of Solar Generation for 1.13.2.

1.14.4.1.1.0:
Revamped the advancement system.
Fixed bugs on UI of Solar Panels.
1.14.4.1.0.3:
Fixed a conflict with the lapis shard and the blue dye.
Fixed an issue with the version control that ran on server side.
Other minor bug fixing.
1.14.4.1.0.2:
Update solar core recipes.
Use the mod of silent's mechanisms to get all the minerals for the recipes.
Fixed minor bugs.
1.14.4.1.0.1:
Fixed a bug in the recipes.
Fixed a serious bug.
1.14.4.1.0.0: First beta of Solar Generation for 1.14.4.
